name: Bloodborne Complete Edition Bundle
summary:
Bloodborne™ Complete Edition Bundle includes Bloodborne™ full game plus The Old Hunters DLC expansion.

Hunt your nightmares as you search for answers in the ancient city of Yharnam, now cursed with a strange endemic illness spreading through the streets like wildfire. Danger, death and madness lurk around every corner of this dark and horrific world, and you must discover its darkest secrets in order to survive.

Experience the nightmare of the hunters who once protected Byrgenwerth’s darkest secrets and uncover the mystery behind Yharnam’s sinister past in The Old Hunters expansion DLC for Bloodborne™.
